Question: Labeled an "unproductive airman" by his superiors, this person was discharged on July 29, 1957.
Hints: In 2001 this person was given a Lifetime Achievement Award at the 15th Annual American Comedy Awards.
A boxset of this person's first 12 stand-up specials (excluding this person: 40 Years of Comedy, and Its Bad For Ya).
NBC scheduled a rerun of the premiere episode of Saturday Night Live, which this person hosted.
